name: Start business process in another registry

properties.label: Business process definition key
properties.description: String with business process definition key

properties.label: Start variables
properties.description: Map of start variables (has to be map)

properties.label: X-Access-Token
properties.description:
Access token of the user
(${initiator().accessToken or completer('taskDefinitionId').accessToken})

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: The process variable to put response to (transient)
